parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID for this message thread.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Profiles that are subscribed to the thread.

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: The amount of messages that are unread by the session profile.

parameters.name: unseen
parameters.description: The amount of messages that are unseen by the session profile.

parameters.name: updated_time
parameters.description: When the thread was last updated.
